verbs.description: [ARG0: U.S. Olympic skier Gus Kenworthy] [V: shot] [ARGM-DIR: back] [ARG1: at critics] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday] [ARGM-TMP: after he decided to skip out on his visit to Donald Trump 's White House] .
